entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question about UseIntellisenseDocumentationFile #70315
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http double check #70314
  • Potential breaking change in socket close behavior in net6 over net5 on Linux #70311
  • Assert failure: !PreemptiveGCDisabled() #70307
  • Assertion failures in merged tests don't get surfaced in AzDO #70306
  • methodical_others test failing/timing out on multiple runtimes, multiple OSes #70305
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: function signature mismatch` in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` - AOT/v8 #70304
  • [wasm] `RuntimeError: function signature mismatch` in `System.Linq.Tests` - AOT/Linux/v8 #70303
  • .NET 7 Preview 6, AOT Compilation fails on Android #70302
  • Test failure: Interop/PInvoke/SetLastError/SetLastErrorTest/SetLastErrorTest.sh #70296
  • Test failure: Loader\classloader\SequentialLayout\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential\ManagedSequential.cmd #70295
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: !LongFile::IsPathNotFullyQualified(path) || !LongFile::ContainsDirectorySeparator(path) #70293
    7.0.0
  • Aes.Create returns null #70290
  • Consider soft-reserving a register for "zero" on x64 #70287
    Future
  • Inconsistent results working with Tasks in AOT-Published Blazor.WebAssembly builds #70286
  • [wasm][debugger] Previous frames on call stack have different line location on Firefox and Chrome #70281
  • Mono: `BadImageFormatException: Method has no body` on tailcall to open delegate bound to interface method #70279
  • ReflectionTypeLoadException when a blazor component parameter is a specific struct layout #70289
  • Improve static library publishing on Unix #70277
  • [API Proposal]: GC_VersionInfo2 #70276
  • Reconsider the exception type thrown when trying to open a directory as file #70275
  • Test failure System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.FijiTimeZoneTest #70274
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/eh/interactions/gcincatch_ro/gcincatch_ro.cmd #70272
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\stackoverflow\\stackoverflowtester\\stackoverflowtester.cmd #70270

Closed

  • ARM64 - GT_MADD - do not emit 'msub' in code-gen #67869
    7.0.0
  • [release/5.0] SSL and authentication failures affecting branch CI #67947
  • [ServiceProvider] Services registered as open generic are overwritten by closed generic registrations when ValidateOnBuild is on #70140
  • System.Net.Http recommended fix #70312
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfConcat #70273
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.EvaluateExpressionsWithElementAccessByLocalVariable Failed #70310
  • build-native.sh doesn't update the shared testhost #70134
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] ILLinker throws InvalidOperationException #70031
  • Assertion failed '!foundDiff' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #69659
    7.0.0
  • Compiled regex hangs and finally fails for stack-intensive regex pattern #69381
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] `function signature mismatch` in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` #70298
  • [wasm][aot] `function signature mismatch` in `system.linq.tests` #70301
  • [wasm][aot] `function signature mismatch` in `system.linq.tests` #70300
  • Blazor wasm HttpClient ignores spaces at the end of URIs even if it is escaped (%20) #70025
  • Sha1_Rfc3174_3 test failure in wasm #70291
  • JsonNode serialize should respect naming policy #70129
  • Blazor WASM JSArrayBufferData exceeds 500MB memory launching through IIS - (Streaming compilation failed. Falling back to ArrayBuffer instantiation. RangeError: WebAssembly.instantiate(): Out of memory: wasm memory) #63921
    7.0.0
  • Introduce DbDataSource abstraction to System.Data #64812
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/11/2022 9:09:01 PM #69444
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests Timeout #58643
    7.0.0
  • Redirected console colour not working #70278
  • [Bug] SSL Connection refused when calling ASP.NET Core API endpoints from .NET MAUI App on Android #62966
    6.0.MAUI
  • RyuJIT generates redundant code when inlining string.IsNullOrEmpty #4207
    Future
  • Potential infinite loop on MacOS on connected sockets #63291
    7.0.0
  • Symbol stripping in NativeAOT to reduce binary size #69847
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on Windows #70316
  • Rename TarFormat to TarEntryFormat #70313
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix TZ Tests #70309
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check for ldobj. #70308
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #70299
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Updating usages of `IntPtr`/`UIntPtr` to be the language keyword `nint`/`nuint` now that they are equivalent #70297
    area-Meta
  • Enable WASM EH as an experiment. #70292
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0][iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70288
    Servicing-consider
  • CMake support in VS open folder for coreclr #70285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fixing the costing of GT_CNS_DBL and GT_CNS_VEC instructions #70215
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop unnecessary exceptions from being thrown from crossgen when a reference is not actually a managed dll #70191
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Bug fixes from dead code elimination #69897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move HostAbortedException to Abstractions #70205
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Extend mono AOT compiler to ingest .mibc profiles #70194
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update libraries' building docs for native components #70284
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Fix lazy loop backtracking uncapture in compiled regexes #70280
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #69902
    breaking-change, area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • Improve binaries filtering for PMI runs of SPMI collection #70294
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Properly handle trailing whitespace in the URL for the HttpClient #70154
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Remove unused stackwalk-related code #70282
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Decouple TimeOnlyConverter from TimeSpanConverter #70035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Fold System.Private.Reflection.Metadata into Corelib #70241
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Delete ENABLE_REFLECTION_TRACE #70244
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add list of pre-requisities for Alpine #70283
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger]Fix entrypoint breakpoint when it's an async method #69856
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70149
    area-CoreLib-mono, os-ios
  • Implement DbDataSource #70006
    area-System.Data, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method tests. #70002
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve string.Format / {Value}StringBuilder.AppendFormat parsing throughput #69757
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove ternary workaround for string.IsNullOrEmpty #63095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not rely on `GT_ADDR` in `gtFoldBoxNullable` #69961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable folding of struct indirs used by returns in local morph #69947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Initial SIMD support #70086
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for symbol stripping #70233
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • limit retries of EPROTOTYPE on macOS #69882
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • allow null TargetHost in SslClientAuthenticationOptions #69071
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Ignoring test for NativeAOT since GetCallingAssembly is unsupported #70221
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-disable `Runtime_56953` #70258
    7.0.0

Updated

  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILVerify] Reporting verification error on protected blocks with more than one handler #64582
    area-ILVerification, 8.0.0
  • Always use portable tailcalling mechanism for delegate tailcalls #70269
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update shared code from linker #70204
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Revert the gc_pin optimization changes. #70234
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add new public APIs for safely manipulating managed pointers #69458
    blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unpin locals #70264
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use MemoryMappedFileAccess.Read when searching a memory mapped file #67386
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • DebuggerDisplay Stopwatch #65753
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • NonBacktracking inner matching loop optimizations #70217
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix race condition in WASM crypto worker #70185
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add legs to build wasm with internal threads only and full threading enabled #68787
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use u8 in more places #69995
    area-Meta
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging wbt failures on windows #70174
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Ensure side effects get spilled for the various hwintrinsic and simdashwintrinsic nodes #70054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable the pause intrinsic test for x86/x64 CoreCLR #70230
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Use `gtEffectiveVal` for `GT_ADD` op1 in `optCreateAssertion` #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Feature/add event to minmax threads config #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • ARM64 - Add GT_CHK_DIV_BY_ZERO #69170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix linker ref param warnings #70082
    area-Meta
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Remove complex marshalling support from crossgen2 #70183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • handle SECURITY_STATUS 0x80090016 #69942
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Fix SmtpClient reuse with SendAsync #70046
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Reenable 4244 warning for Mono. #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Investigate helix error return #70238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #66783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix async handle leak when sync RandomAccess read/write on async handle fails #69956
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places #70176
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Include `include` folder in runtime pack on all Mono platforms #69719
    area-Build-mono
  • Don't explicitly link ICU into Mono on FreeBSD #70088
    area-Build-mono
  • Add a build lane for FreeBSD Mono. #69715
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a few dependencies on field sequences #69991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Do not retype SIMD nodes #70265
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix incorrect none_no value when NUMA node is undefined in distribute_other_procs #69082
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Bring Enum.InternalBoxEnum to C# (CoreCLR) #70181
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Refactor how implicit byrefs are morphed #70243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NO MERGE] Upgrade SDK to 7.0.100-preview.5.22276.4 #70117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove JsonCodeGen branch #1892

Closed

  • Publish for linux-musl-x64 fails with missing libraries #1891

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Fractions<T> to System.Numerics #25874
  • Implement INumber<T> for System.Numerics.BigInteger and System.Numerics.Complex #25873
  • WPF publish adds Windows Forms dlls (including design time dlls) #25869
  • The --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` and `dotnet watch run` should fallback to a case-insensitive match if a case-sensitive match isn't found #25868
  • Not specifying a value for the --launch-profile option of `dotnet run` results in InvalidOperationException #25867
  • wrong exception line number in stack trace in the publish package #25858

Closed

  • Restore failed with NuGet error if applying private feed on RHEL 9 #25859
  • Phase out MULTI_LEVEL_LOOKUP #12353
  • [Package-Validation] Add flag to run the package baseline validation in a strict mode. #21333

PullRequests

Merged

  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update man pages #25755
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • Exclude documentation changes from triggering builds #25842
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check if publishaot is used #25323
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the RID target from lower macOS to the latest one #25784
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suggested names don't have proper kinds in top-level statement context #61727
  • VS17.2.3+ Rename symbol -> "rename symbols file" checkbox disabled #61726
    17.3
  • .editorconfig doesn't affect ctrl-shift-B / command-line builds? #61724
  • No warning when base required member is not initialized in constructor with "SetsRequiredMembers" attribute #61718
  • Issue: Lock Congestion using CSharpSyntaxRewriter #61716

Closed

  • 'CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider' encountered an error and has been disabled. #61642
    Backlog
  • "Add parameter" quickfix doesn't work for adding `Action<>` #61715
  • Shift+Enter removes XML comment of property #61291
    17.3
  • Convert ternary operator to if statement #42921
    Backlog
  • Editor Context Menu allows to view Call Hierarchy on Property Setters, but Search finds no results #57856
    Backlog
  • Remove HasChangesAsync #55625
    17.3
  • Improve `ru` localization for IDE0040 #61324
    Backlog
  • Improve `ru` localization for IDE0059 codefix #61325
    17.3
  • Ctrl+Alt+Click for Go To Implementation #24856
    Backlog
  • Incorrect suggestion to use discard pattern breaks compilation #45768
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1809781 #61735
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61734
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid double typechecks in simple code checks #61730
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid delegate allocations for ImmutableArray<T>.Any #61729
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove delegate and capture allocations #61719
    Area-IDE
  • Report an error for an implicit implementation of an inaccessible interface members #61717
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

Merged

  • Unwrap unexpected AggregateException for clarity #61684
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Include the Server GC descriptors in local ServiceHub deployment #53595
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • PR feedback on the 'replace conditional with statements' PR. #61731
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Correctly add parameter when represented as a method group #61720
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Insert braces for field and event in SmartBreakLine #61728
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61616
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Replace conditional with assignment #61697
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61733
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61732
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix FindReference crash in metadata/source inheritance and multi-targetting. #61721
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash with embedded lang detection in VB #61725
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Change LOC branch for VS 17.3 #61722
    Area-Infrastructure
  • View call hierarchy fix (#57856) #59739
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add Move Static Member To Existing Type #61519
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add a hack to remove output from the Razor generator if suppressed #61675
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61723
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use fast in-proc heuristic to implement HasChangesAsync #61690
    Interactive-EnC, Next
  • Remove solution options OOP serialization #61406
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1798834 #61612
  • Fixed incorrect discard suggestion in var pattern #61657
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61714
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61713
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [LSP] Disable sln crawler diagnostics when LSP pull is enabled #61396
    Area-IDE
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Reducing allocations in completion #61620
    Area-IDE
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Prefer stack storage for highly-contended temporary array #61670
    Area-Compilers
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE
  • Implements automated VSIX and NuGet feeds for easy feature dogfooding #45195
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Find implementation assemblies for reference assemblies in the .NET SDK #61526
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove ISupportDirectMemoryAccess. #61693
    Area-IDE
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Trigger refactoring if the cursor is put on single field or event syntax node #55523
    Area-IDE
  • Code diagnostic and fix provider for 45832 "Make anonymous function static" #46429
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove IDocumentOperationService.SupportsDiagnostics #34009
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Concept-Continuous Improvement
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61710
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor WASM] Cannot read properties of null (reading 'removeChild') #42065
  • [Blazor WASM] InputSelect: binding no longer works with negative numbers #42064
  • W3CLoggerProcessor doesn't update fields directive when it changes #42059
    7.0-preview7
  • AS #42058
  • Kestrel should trigger ConnectionClosedRequested on HTTP/2 and HTT/3 GOAWAYs #42057
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Exceptions in SignalR streaming results are not reported in the server logs #42050
  • Make it easier to discover how to enforce/require auth in an application #42048
  • Add methods for registering both authentication and authorization middlewares/services #42047

Closed

  • [Route Groups] WithTags et al. should target IEndpointConventionBuilder #41428
    7.0-preview6
  • W3CLogger Custom Fields #41698
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Inconsistent `crossgen2` build failures #41891
  • RequestObjectURLAsync() as BrowserFileExtensions #25641
    Backlog
  • QRCode/BarCode Scanning and Direct Printing in POS #26393
    Backlog
  • Enhancement: Add Blazor IBrowserFile Id to interface #31638
    Backlog
  • Update project templates so that separate launch profiles for HTTP and HTTPS are configured #41982
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor index.html should mimic the top level site #24910
    Backlog
  • Add access to services for route handler filter factories to RouteHandlerContext #41900
    7.0-preview6
  • "body stream already read" error due to broken blazor wasm fallback #40547
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ASP.NET Core 3.0: NullReferenceException in HttpContext.RequestAborted #17085
    Backlog
  • ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT in Blazor Wasm with hosted server does not work #38654
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Minimal API: Route Handler Filter does not show errors list #42044
  • Template metadata is not localized in Visual Studio #42053
  • Problem validators langage use when there is a decimal field in a form #42014
  • BlazorWebView from Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.Wpf should be working with Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.Authentication #42046
  • Perf improvement: json #42019
  • Developers can easily work with JWT bearer authentication for API apps during development #39857
    7.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Add HttpContext to ITicketStore (#41908) #42063
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Retry on IIS startup failures #42062
    area-infrastructure
  • Localize strings in user-jwts tool #42061
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • [release/3.1] Update SPA template JS dependencies #42060
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Identity UI: Tweak styles for floating identity forms #42056
    area-identity

Merged

  • Add TBuilder overloads to WithTags and others #41830
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Update TFM for reference assemblies in analyzer tests #42023
    area-infrastructure, analyzer, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6
  • Change project templates to have separate "http" and "https" launch profiles #42027
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview6
  • RequestDelegateFactory context classes ApplicationServices property #41952
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Update the cookies authentication handler to always honor AuthenticationProperties.RedirectUri #42039

  • Fix IRequestCookieCollection.TryGetValue() possible null reference #42033
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • Remove explicit parameterName #42026
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix flakyServerReset_AfterEndStream_NoError test #42030
    area-runtime
  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
    area-infrastructure
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • Did the first task of issue #42016: removing the default address (https://localhost:5001) for https #42021
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Add support for reading default scheme from config #41987
    area-security
  • Fix nullability of TryUpdateModelAsync #41959

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Debugging dumps with cross-platform DAC. #2910
    7.0.0
  • Activity Ids not assigned to Activity tracked events when using certain provider strings #2611
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-sos install fails on Apple M1 #2370
    7.0.0

Updated

  • Fix DebugServices.UnitTests VersionData failures #2955
    Future
  • Guidance on using PerfView/other perf visualization tools. #2911
    Future
  • Add docs to better describe the .NET diagnostic experience #515
    7.0.0
  • SOS not able to resolve symbols correctly when `COMPlus_TieredCompilation` is on #2885
    Future
  • `dotnet-gcdump` System.ApplicationException: ETL file shows the start of a heap dump but not its completion. #2766
    7.0.0
  • BasicProcessInfoNoSuspendTest and BasicProcessInfoNoSuspendTestAsync are flaky #2760
    Future
  • Many dotnet diagnostics tools fail to run on stuck container #2719
    7.0.0
  • bpmd for single-file app under lldb at program launch doesn't work #2673
    Future
  • Using dotnet-counters tool stops internal EventListener #2664
    7.0.0
  • SOS bpmd command on Main can stop twice #2607
    Future
  • Binaries are not signed and fail to run on macOS Monterey with .NET 6 ARM64 runtime #2554
    Future
  • SOS testing: enable testing Windows+ triage dumps for 6.0 apps #2542
    Future
  • TestLogsAllCategoriesDefaultLevelFallback fails frequently #2541
    Future
  • SOS Watson support work items #2512
    Future
  • Fix SOS single file support #2515
    Future
  • [Regions] Avoid using allocation_started for USE_REGIONS #2483
    Future
  • Fix bpmd on Alpine and enable the disabled tests for Alpine #2459
    Future
  • Various SOS tests fail on Linux arm32 #2447
    Future
  • gcdump fails to collect dump under high load. #2404
    Future
  • dotnet trace with EtwSelfDescribingEventFormat produces unreadable events #2367
    Future
  • Document caveats around ptrace and dumping #2246
    Future
  • Diposing Stream from EventPipeSession during unit test causes segfault on Linux and OSX #2223
    Future
  • should_check_bgc_mark and fgc_should_consider_object need to be updated for regions #2208
    Future
  • We should not limit VerifyObjectMember to objects on small object heap only #2199
    Future
  • lldb failed attach to dotnet process (MacOs) #2110
    Future
  • Verify dotnet-dump and createdump work with user namespace remapping #2150
    Future
  • Reenable GCTests for MacOS on 6.0 #1950
    Future
  • Diagnostics repo docs update #1673
    Future
  • Make sure we are properly publishing bundled-tools symbols #1631
    Future
  • Clarify contribution guidelines #792
    Future
  • [macos] Shipping dotnet-* tools unsigned #1942
    Future
  • -- feature of diagnostic tools forwards SigInt to child process #1938
    8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MSTEST project referring to a MAUI project sometimes fails to build #7806
  • Grid in a ContentView with a ControlTemplate with a ContentPresenter does not size #7805
    6.0-sr2
  • Unable to un-set values on Windows #7803
    6.0-servicing
  • Build crashes on iPadOS immediately when using Location #7801
  • NET7 Include Default Color Styles #7800
    .NET 7
  • ListView not showing and/or throwing exception #7799
  • .NET Maui application throws System.DllNotFoundException for libMicrosoft.CognitiveServices.Speech.core.so #7792
  • doesn't have a target for 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0'. Ensure that restore has run and that you have included 'net6.0-windows10.0.19041.0' in the TargetFrameworks for your project. #7790
  • Publish .NET MAUI Application as Windows Executable #7789
  • Changing the default appicon doesn't work. #7786
  • [MacCatalyst] Button's appearance does not look good after building an application with adopted Mac idiom #7782
  • Shell with content does not appear on iPad with OS 14.4.2 #7781
  • Shell: Tab pages contain ShellContent that does not display settings correctly #7780
  • [Mac] Can I open mac window with fullScreen #7778
  • Cross-platform solution for Right click context menu on desktop app #7777
  • Maui mediapicker on Android Platform opens a blank screen #7776
  • [Editor] Completed command #7775
  • ScrollView and window size #7774

Closed

  • SignalR Client with MessagePack Protocol fails on MAUI iOS. #7753
  • Android Device Tests Crashing #7798
    6.0-sr2
  • Unable to run MAUI app after updating to the latest version #7505

PullRequests

Created

  • Use the new layout system in ContentPresenter #7807
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix SearchBar semantics #7802
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Fix BackgroundColor property issue on SearchBar #7794
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue using DynamicResource TextColor on Label FormattedString #7793
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK from 1.0.3 to 1.1.0 #7788
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Update to .NET 7 SDKs #7375
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android,iOS] Fix Selection on CollectionView and VSM color changes for Layouts #7689
    area/collectionview 📃, 6.0-sr1
  • [Tizen] Fix RendererToHandlerShim.Tizen #7622
    platform/tizen, 6.0-sr1
  • [housekeeping] Fix signing and insertion for net6 branch #7791
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update ide.host.json schema. #7736
    area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr1
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22301.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22302.1 #7731
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Dependencies pack #6871
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 7
  • BlazorWebView WPF tab navigation improvements #7742
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix GridLayoutManager Layout calculation #7712
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix TemplatedView #7771
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue clipping RadioButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue not rendering Border background using a Shadow #7695
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Correctly return the value from Focus method #7694
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS] Fix issue using gradients in Button with Corner Radius #7666

  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527

  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358

  • [iOS] Clip Border content based on StrokeShape property #7335

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nested query, let clause, select enum issue #28170

Closed

  • Shadow property for Primary Key - exception 'No backing field could be found' #28154
  • Loading resources in DbContext constructor causes Add-Migration to fail. #28149
  • Include filter information is lost after Select method #28141
  • Allow for deferred concurrency check by using token's manually set value rather than value at time of retrieval #27865

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.27.0 to 3.27.2 #28167
